Reviews.Title: Sanyo 18.5in LCD Full HD TV
Reviews.Author: joni
Reviews.Content: Great TV. GREAT picture quality.  Love it. I would highly recommend this TV. What I like most is that it is light weight and moves easily and again the picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Excellant Sony
Reviews.Author: Blanca Estella Garcia "CONCERN PERSON"
Reviews.Content: A joy coming home and watching the latest on this Sony. The service was excellant,missing the remote and was refunded $25 then turned to buy the remote from Sony. The packaging and overall was excellant. The screen is nice and the quality looks new. Thank you so much. Do business with these people. Keep there name and product shining.

ProductInfo.Features:
18.5" Diagonal LCD
Wide screen 16:9 Aspect Ratio
Native Panel Resolution: 1366 x 768 pixels(WXGA)
Wide Viewing Angles:170 H x 160 V Degrees
Integrated Digital Clear QAM /ATSC + Analog NTSC Tuner
ProductInfo.Name: Sanyo DP 19649 18.5" HDTV LCD
